vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Criado & Associates, LLC., formerly known as Criado & Associates, Inc. for the engineering design of Eads/Hutchins Avenue from Eads Avenue to East Colorado Boulevard to Hutchins Avenue and 8th Street - Not to exceed $547,563.20 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($472,077.20), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($41,955.45), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($33,530.55)
